Package: de.unigoettingen.sub.be.ous.print.layout

[Groovy] Class Xml2Parser.LayoutParser

      • de.unigoettingen.sub.be.ous.print.layout.Xml2Parser.LayoutParser

      • Class encapsulating a generated XSLT based parser
